/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a large concrete overpass, which is characterized by its distinctive curved arches. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpass and gives a sense of scale to the cityscape.
